title: Championship Riven
body: will championship riven ever comeback to the store?{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
Hippalus [mentioned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/H004gAPw-ecommerce-qa?comment=00350002) that Championship Riven may make a return to the store at some point.

"*Yes I think Championship Riven will come back someday. Most limited edition skins took four years to come back after release, and it's been two years for Riven so far.*"

This was from ~ a year ago, making it about three years now.
So it will be back next year?
Pretty sure when it came out it was stated it would NEVER return..

It was available for purchase in Worlds S4, and Championship Riven was on sale during Worlds Season 1 and Season 2. Championship Shyvana and Championship Kalista will be the only Championship skins on sale this Worlds.

Championship Riven was not available during worlds Season 1, it was only available during Season 2. In fact, there was no Championship skin for Season 1 at all, it started in Season 2 with Riven.

Not entirely. Championship Riven was only available during Season 2 worlds. It wasn't available during Season 3, just Season 2. It hasn't come back at all after that because it is technically a Limited skin, and it's the only Championship skin that is Limited. Championship Thresh is a Legacy skin which is why Riot brought it back for Season 4, and it's likely that it will come back this year as well, with Championship Shyvana.
